snippet.title: Deep Dark Wrath | v1.0 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Deep Dark Wrath is a hand-drawn, card collecting, dungeon-crawler where you fend off countless enemies and find its source with the help of powerful Enchanted Cards. Deep Dark Wrath will be releasing this 27th of May 2024 on Steam (Windows PC) and Itch (Windows PC and Android), but it has Free Demos you can try out now!

This is a gameplay trailer of what the Full Version of Deep Dark Wrath will look like once it releases.

◼️ Wishlist on Deep Dark Wrath's Steam Page ◼️
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2891520/Deep_Dark_Wrath/
◼️ Add to a Collection on Deep Dark Wrath's itch.io Page ◼️
https://craftedcircuitry.itch.io/deep-dark-wrath
◼️ My Tumblr for Latest Updates ◼️
